children.text: Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 1: Adhyardhaśatakaṃ nāma stotram ācāryamātṛceṭaviracitam (Prasādapratibhodhava = Śatapañcāśatka of Mātṛceṭa)
sarvadā sarvathā sarve yasya doṣā na santi ha /
tameva śaraṇaṃ gantuṃ taṃ stotuṃ tamupāsitum /
tasyaiva śāsane sthātuṃ nyāyyaṃ yadyasti cetanā //
savāsanāśca te doṣā na santyekasya tāyinaḥ /
iyanta iti nāstyanta īdṛśā iti kā kathā /
puṇyā ityeva tu guṇānprati te mukharā vayam //
prāṇairapi tvayā sādho mānitaḥ praṇayī janaḥ //
parārthe tyajataḥ prāṇān yā prītirabhavat tava /
na sā naṣṭopalabdheṣu prāṇeṣu prāṇināṃ bhavet //
tvameva vīra sārajño dūre tasyetaro janaḥ //
nākṛtvā duṣkaraṃ karma durlabhaṃ labhyate padam /
tvayā sūktaṃ duruktaṃ tu viṣavat parivarjitam //
agatvā sadṛśaiḥ spardhāṃ tvaṃ loke śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ //
tena samyakpratipadā tvayi niṣṭhāṃ guṇā gatāḥ //
anena sarvaṃ vyākhyātaṃ yat kiñcitsādhu laukikam /
tenaiva kevalaṃ sādho sāmyaṃ te tasya ca tvayā //
sarvaṃ cāvarjitaṃ māravijayaṃ prati te jagat //
yasya te cetaso 'nyatvaṃ tasya te kā stutirbhavet //
guṇeṣvapi na saṃgo 'bhūt tṛṣṇā na guṇavatsvapi /
upaśāntaṃ ca kāntaṃ ca dīptamapratighāti ca /
nibhṛtaṃ corjitaṃ cedaṃ rupaṃ kamiva nākṣipet //
rupaṃ prīṇāti te cakṣuḥ samaṃ tadubhayorapi //
darśane darśane prītiṃ vidadhāti navāṃ navām //
kaṃ nu prathamato vande tvāṃ mahākaruṇāmuta /
kālā labdhaprasarayā tat te karuṇayā kṛtam //
śāntādaraṇyād grāmāntaṃ tvaṃ hi nāga iva hradāt /
tathā hi kṛtvā śatadhā dhīrā balimiva kvacit /
tathā hi bādhamānāpi tvāṃ satī nāparādhyate //
gamakaṃ suprayuktatvāt trikalyāṇaṃ hi te vacaḥ //
tato vimṛśyamānāni rajāṃsi ca tamāṃsi ca //
avandhyaṃ tena sarvatra sarvaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tava //
mataṃ yadi vigarhanti nāsti dṛṣṭisamo ripuḥ //
tat saṃsmṛtya virupe 'pi stheyaṃ te śāsane bhavet //
kathaṃ na nāma kāryaṃ syādādīptaśirasāpi te //
prayāti tatra tu svairī yatra mṛtyoragocaraḥ //
śāsanaṃ nādriyante yat kiṃ vaiśasataraṃ tataḥ //
prabhūtamapi te nātha sadā nātmani vidyate /
vaktavya iva sarvairhi svairaṃ svārthe niyujyase //
yena kena cideva tvaṃ yatra tatra yathā tathā /
akroṣṭāro jitāḥ kṣāntyā drugdhāḥ svastyayanena ca /
tato dharmo gatamale vastre raṅga ivārpitaḥ //
na so 'styupāyaḥ śaktirvā yena na vyāyataṃ tava /
na hi vaktuṃ ca kartuṃ ca bahu sādhu ca śakyate /
api ye parinirvānti te 'pi te nānṛṇā janāḥ //
tava te 'vasthitā dharme svārthameva tu kurvate /
yaḥ śramastannimittaṃ tu tava kā tasya niṣkṛtiḥ //
karaṇīyaṃ bhaved yatra na dattānunayo bhavān //
yadi saṃcāriṇo dharmāḥ syurime niyataṃ tvayā /
ye tvāṃ sattvā namasyanti tebhyo 'pi sukṛtaṃ namaḥ //
akṣayāste guṇā nātha śaktistu kṣayiṇī mama /
na te guṇāṃśāvayavo 'pi kīrtitaḥ parā ca nastuṣṭiravasthitā hṛdi /
akarśanenaiva mahāhradāmbhasāṃ janasya tarṣāḥ praśamaṃ vrajanti ha //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 2: Ādibuddhadvādaśakastotram
rūpāya jaṅgamānāṃ te sthāvarāṇāṃ ca murtaye /
bhavyāya vṛddharūpāya bālāya te namo namaḥ //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 3: Ākāśagarbhanāmāṣṭottaraśatastotram
dāna pradāna dānāgrya tyāga tyāgāgrya dāyaka /
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 4: (Ārya)mañjuśrīnāmāṣṭottaraśatakastotram
khasamo madhyakalpastvaṃ tvaṃ tejo vāyureva ca //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 5: (Ārya)tārānamaskāraikaviṃśatistotram
viṣaṃ tasya mahāghoraṃ sthāvaraṃ cātha jaṅgamam /
smaraṇānna padaṃ yāti khāditaṃ pi(pī)tameva vā //
iti śrīsamyaksaṃbuddhavailo(ro)canabhāṣitaṃ bhagavatyāryatārādevyā namaskāraikaviṃśatināmāṣṭottaraśatakaṃ buddhabhāṣitaṃ parisamāptam //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 6: (Ārya)tārāsragdharāstotram ācārya sarvajñamitraviracitam
śrutvā bhūyaḥ parebhyaḥ kṣatanayana iva vyomni candrārkalakṣmī
sarvasmin sattvamārge nanu tava karuṇā nirviśeṣaṃ pravṛttā
duḥkhyevāhaṃ tathāpi pratapati dhigaho duṣkṛtaṃ durvidagdham //
sarvebhyo 'bhyarthitārthān visṛjasi na ca te vikriyā jātu kācit //
yo yaḥ klaiśaughavahnijvalitatanurahaṃ tāriṇī tasya tasye
tyātmopajñaṃ pratijñāṃ kuru mayi saphalāṃ duḥkhapātālamagne /
nārhatyanyo 'pyupekṣāṃ janani janayituṃ kiṃ punaryādṛśī tvam /
pāpī yadyasmi kasmāttvayi mama mahatī barddhate bhaktireṣā
śrutyā smṛtyā ca nāmnāpyapaharasi haṭhātpāpamekā tvameva /
tyaktavyāpārabhārā tadasi mayi kathaṃ kathyatāṃ tathyakathye
pathyaṃ glāne mariṣyatyapi vipulakṛpaḥ kiṃ bhiṣag rorudhīti //
yuṣmatpādābjapūjāṃ na kṣaṇamapi labhe yattadarthe viśeṣā
kṣuttṛṭkṣāmopakaṇṭhastyajati sa sapadi vyāpadaṃ tāṃ durantāṃ
sākṣādvetti tvadīyāṃ guṇagaṇagaṇanāṃ sarvavit tatsuto vā /
yastu vyādāya vaktraṃ valibhujaraṭitaṃ mādṛśo rāraṭīti
kintu snigdhasya bandhorviṣamiva purato duḥkhamudgīrya vācāṃ
puṣṭiṃ jñānopadeśaiḥ kuru dhanakaruṇe dhvaṃsaya dhvāntamantaḥ /
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 7: (Ārya)tārāṣṭottaraśatanāmastotram
mahatā tapasā yukto maitryā ca kṛpayānvitaḥ //
dharmaṃ dideśa tasyāṃ ca mahatyāṃ devaparṣadi /
mucyante yena sattvāste tanme brūhi mahāmune /
kampayantīṃ ca trīn lokān trāsayantīṃ yakṣarākṣasān /
nīlotpalakarāṃ devīṃ mā bhairmā bhairiti bruvan //
tena tāreti māṃ loke gāyanti munipuṃgavāḥ /

om locane sulocane tāre tārodbhave sarvasattvānukampini sarvasattvatāriṇi sahasrabhuje sahasranetre / om namo bhagavate avalokaya avalokaya māṃ sarvasattvāṃśca huṃ huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā / om śuddhe viśuddhe sugatātmaje
maitrīhṛdaye nirmale śyāme śyāmarūpi mahāprājñe prabalavarabhūṣite /
aparājitā mahāraudrī viśvarūpī mahābalā / om suśriye //
rakṣaṇī mohanī śāntā kāntārī drāvaṇī śubhā /
brahmāṇī vedamātā ca guhyā ca guhyavāsinī //
duḥkhī syāttu sukhī nityaṃ daridro dhanavān bhavet /
putro bhavenmahāprājño medhāvī ca na saṃśayaḥ //
śatravo mitratāṃ yānti śṛṅgiṇaḥ śunakā api //
sa dīrghakālamāyuṣmān śriyaṃ ca labhate naraḥ //
chāyāmapi na laṅghanti kiṃ punastasya vigraham //
duṣṭasattvā na bādhante vyādhayo nākramanti ca /
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 8: (Ārya)tārāstutiḥ ācārya candradāsakṛtā
sapadi puro narasya tāreti manāgapi nāmadhāriṇaḥ /
bhagavati bhaktivantumupasarpati tava na vane 'pi taskaraḥ //
yadi tava nāmakaṃ hṛdi karoti hi rākṣasaikakaḥ
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 9: Aṣṭamātṛkāstotram
śaniśca rāhuḥ ketuśca yamāya ca namo namaḥ //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 10: Avadhānastotram (vandanāstavaṃ vā)
śubhrāṃśumaulitilakāya jaṭadharāya nityaṃ namāmi śirasā karuṇāmayāya //
rāgādidoṣaparimukta sunirmalāya nityaṃ namāmi śirasā karuṇāmayāya //
cintāmaṇiṃ susadṛśaṃ tvatidurbhago 'haṃ nityaṃ namāmi śirasā karuṇāmayāya //
duḥkhārṇave patitamuddhara māṃ kṛpālo nityaṃ namāmi śirasā karuṇāmayāya //
śrīkrauṃcadāraṇatithau ca stutiṃ karomi me dehi vāñchitaphalaṃ bhuvanaikanātha //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 11: Avalokiteśvarahayagrīvadhāraṇī

namo ratnatrayāya / nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya / namaḥ sarvasattvavyasanaghātine / namaḥ sarvasattvavyasanāvahāriṇe / namaḥ sarvasattvabhayottāraṇāya / namaḥ sarvabhavapraśamanakarāya / namaḥ sarvasattvabodhicikitsaṃkarāya / namaḥ sarvabandhanacchedanaparāya / namaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramokṣaṇakarāya / namaḥ sarvāndhakāravidhamanakarāya / namaḥ sarvavidyārājavaśaprāptaye mahāyogayogīśvarāya /

tasmai namaskṛtvā idamāryāvalokiteśvaramukhodgīrṇam / ṛṣividadādevanāgayakṣarākṣasaśakrabrahmalokapālaviṣṇumaheśvaranārāyaṇaskandakuberāsurendramātṛgaṇa namaskṛtaṃ vajrakṣuramahīyaṃ hayagrīvabrahmaparamahṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmi / aprameyārthasādhakam asahyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvavighnavināśakam / amoghaṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣāṇāñca vināyanam / tad yathā

om tarula tarula vitarula vitarula sarvaviṣaghātaka sarvabhūtavidrāvaka jvalitānalavisphuliṅgāṭṭahāsa kesarātopāpravitakāya vajrakṣuranirgatita calitavasudhātala bajrodaśvasata hāsitamarutakṣatipraśamanakara paraduṣṭavighnān saṃbhakṣaṇakara svavidyopadeśakara paramaśāntikara buddha buddha bodhayāmiti /

bhagavan hayagrīva sarvavidyāhṛdayamāvartayiṣyāmi / khāda khāda mahāraudramantreṇa / rakṣa rakṣa ātmasvahitān mantreṇa / sidhya sidhya sarvakarmasu me siddhe dehi dehi / āveśa āveśa praveśa praveśa sarvagraheṣu apratihata / dhuna dhuna vidhuna vidhuna matha matha pramatha pramatha sarvavaropagrama / kṛtakakhordo / durlaṅghita mūṣika / viṣakara viṣadraṃṣṭra viṣacūrṇayo abhicāraviṣakaraṇa / sidhya añjana cakṣurmohana / cittavikṣobhaṇakara / nityāparaprekṣaṇa trāsaya trāsaya mahābodhisattva ṛddhadaṃṣṭraṇena sarvabhayebhyaḥ sattvānāṃ rakṣa rakṣa / mama buddhadharmasaṃghānujñātaṃ me karma śīghraṃ kuru kuru phaṭ / hayagrīvāya phaṭ / bajrakṣurāya phaṭ / vajradaṃṣṭrotkaṭabhayabhairavāya phaṭ / paramantraṇanāśanakarāya phaṭ / paraduṣṭavighnān saṃbhakṣaṇakarāya phaṭ / sarvagrahotsādanakarāya phaṭ / sarvagraheṣu

apratihatāya phaṭ / paṭalamukhāya phaṭ / ye kecit mama ahiteṣiṇaḥ kāye kramanti mantrayaṇa yamanti juhvānati kākhordaṃ kurvanti / tena sarveṇābhimukhena vākrīhāya phaṭ / namaḥ sarvaduṣṭagrahotsādanāya hayagrīvāya sidhyantu mantrapadaiḥ svāhā / om amitodbhavāya huṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā / om namo hayāya svāhā / om namo viśvamūrtaye svāhā / namaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sidhyantu mantrapadāya svāhā //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 12: Avalokiteśvarāṣṭakastotram
stutvā guṇairanupamairanubindupātraṃ stotraṃ mayā kṛtamidaṃ jaḍavāliśena /
lokeśvaraṃ guṇanidhiṃ guṇasāgaraṃ ca nityaṃ namāmi śirasāñjalisaṃpuṭena //
prāṇeṣu yan sravati yena rasāmbupārān kṣuttṛṣṇaduḥkhaparipīḍitasarvasattvān /
evaṃvidhaṃ jagadidaṃ paripālanāya tasmai namo 'stu satataṃ hi yathārthanāmne //
sarveṣu yasya karuṇāmayavatsalatvaṃ tasmai namāmi bhavate karuṇāmayāya //
kenāpi tvadguṇagaṇā gaṇane na śakyāstaṃ lokanāthamavalokitanāmasaṃjñam //
vāme ca maṇḍaladharaṃ varadaṃ ca savye tvāṃ lokanātha śaraṇaṃ pravrajāmi nityam //
nāthasya yasya bhavataścaraṇāmbujaṃ ca taṃ lokanāthacaraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi //
vaiśvānarāsuraśataiḥ parivārabhūtaṃ taṃ lokanāthacaraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'smi //
ślokāṣṭakaṃ pratidinaṃ khalu ye paṭhanti te prāpnuvanti sahasā dhanaputramokṣān /
kuṣṭhādiroganikaraṃ kṣamatāṃ prayāti vandāmahe ca nitarāṃ tava pādayugme //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 13: Avalokiteśvarastavaḥ candrakāntābhikṣuṇīkṛtaḥ
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 14: Avalokiteśvarastotram carapatipādaviracitam
lokeśa tvaṃ māmaśaraṇyaṃ rakṣa kṛpālo kuru kāruṇyam //
māmavadhāraya mā viruvantaṃ trāhi mahākṛpa naumi bhavantam //
pālaya bhagavannavalokaya māṃ yāvadavīciṃ yāmi na viṣamām //
nātha mayā kṛtapāpamaśeṣaṃ nāśaya saṃprati kāyikadoṣam //
adhunā tanmama mānasapāpaṃ sphoṭaya nātha karomi vilāpam //
sattvā ye nivasanti sadārtā rakṣasi tāniti tava mayi vārtā //
tena mamopari sṛja kāruṇyaṃ vīkṣya śarīragataṃ tāruṇyam /
iti śṛṇu bhagavan bhavati bhaṇāmi yāvannarakaṃ naiva viśāmi //
kiṃ copetya karoṣi parārthaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmakṛtārtham /
athavā prekṣya kṛpā tava puṇyaṃ janayasi dṛṣṭaṃ kathamavipannam //
smaraṇenāpi bhavasi parituṣṭaḥ kṣipasi ca kaluṣaṃ kimiti na dṛṣṭaḥ /
yasmād bhagavan parahitadakṣa kṣepaṃ mā kuru māmiha rakṣa //
siddhayati yakṣastrīpuraveśaḥ tuṣyasi yasya tvaṃ lokeśa //
te tvayi tuṣṭe puṣṭaśarīrā vilasantyarujo guṇagambhīrāḥ //
garalaṃ vyādhirgrahaḍākinyaḥ śāntiṃ yānti sadā yoginyaḥ /
sarati na tasya puro yamadūtaḥ proto yasya ca tvaṃ jinabhūtaḥ //
iti lokeśvara kiṃ kriyamāṇaṃ muñcasi bhagavan māmatrāṇam /
nītaṃ janma mayā 'smin sakalaṃ jaṭharanimittaṃ bhramatā vikalam //
tatkuru saṃprati mama lokeśa praṇato vividhāñjalirahameṣaḥ /
yenābhuktvāpāyikadoṣaṃ sugatiṃ bhavato yāmi na mokṣam //
paramapakurvaṃnnapi karuṇāvān mayi paritoṣaṃ na karoṣi bhavān /
sakalajanārthaṃ prati yā karuṇā sā kiṃ bhavato niyataspharaṇā /
yena na rakṣasi kilviṣavantaṃ bhavataḥ purato māṃ viruvantam //
nātha kṛpā te vyomaviśālā sattveṣu hi yathāmbudadhārā /
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 15: Avalokiteśvarastotram vāsukināgarājakṛtam
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 16: Avalokiteśvarāṣṭottaraśatanāmastotram
śambhu śaṅkara śuddhārtha buddhapadma namo 'stu te //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 17: Bhadracarīpraṇidhānastotram

atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparamparānabhilāpyānabhilāpya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotyamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ //
sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān //
dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi //
yā ca anuttarapūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam //
yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam //
ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṃgataprāptāḥ /
tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthān cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai //
yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam //
pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca dhriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ //
yāvata keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
yāvata keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitā sada bhontu arogāḥ /
sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśāḥ //
bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā //
yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam //
ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu na jātu vimuhyet /
ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇāyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam //
karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūryaśaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ //
sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu //
bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam //
ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
kāyatu vācatu cetanato cā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam //
ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu //
saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
teṣu ca pūja kareyu udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ //
bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam //
sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃcaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiyabuddhān /
buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ //
ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam //
ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena //
ye ca anāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān //
mārabalaṃ abalaṃ karamāṇaḥ pūrayi bhadracarībala sarvān //
tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣāt bhadracarīya bibudhyiya bodhim //
jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam //
yādṛśanāmana bhadravidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena //
sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām //
no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
apramāṇu cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām //
yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvata niṣṭha mama praṇidhānam //
ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā ratnaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam //
varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracari praṇidhānam //
lābha sulabdha sajīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣajanma /
yādṛśu so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti //
pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam //
jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirūpetaḥ /
kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
buddhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam //
yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
buddhavijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha //
mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam //
tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī vara bhadracarīye //
kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam //
tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kariyāvata loke //
tahi jinamaṃḍali śobhaniramye padmavare rūcire upapannaḥ /
vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato amitābhajinasya //
vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhya ca tasmin nirmita koṭiśatebhiranekaiḥ /
sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena //
bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 18: Bhaktiśatakam mahāpaṇḍita-rāmacandrabhāratīviracitam
yasmin rāgalavo 'pi naiva na punardveṣo na mohastathā /
buddho vā giriśo 'thavā sa bhagavān tasmai namaskurmahe //
devaḥ śambhurna vairī harirapi na ripuḥ kevalī no sapatno
nodāsīnaḥ svayambhurna ca punarapare te pare vāsavādyāḥ /
śāstā buddho na bandhurjagati na janako naikagotraikajātiḥ
kintveṣāṃ vītarāgo bhavati sakalavid yaḥ sudhībhiḥ sa sevyaḥ //
vītāvidyo vimāyo jagati sa bhagavān vītarāgo munīndraḥ
kaḥ sevyo buddhimadbhirvadata vadata me bhrātarasteṣu muktyai //
brāhmaṃ vaiṣṇavamaiśvarañca bahudhā labdhvā padaṃ hetutaiḥ (taḥ) saṃsāre vata saṃsaranti punarapyekāntaduḥkhāspade /
jitānaṅgaiḥ sevyaṃ bhavatu mama tadvastu śaraṇam //
sadīyaṃ sarvīyaṃ bhavatu mama tad vastu śaraṇam //
kvacinnīlaṃ pītaṃ kvacidapi ca raktaṃ kvacidap
dṛśāṃ navyātithyaṃ bhavatu mama tad vastu śaraṇam //
punarapi śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi buddhaṃ punarapi lokaguruṃ guruṃ karomi /
punarapi kathayāmi naumi vande, tvayi mama gautama naiva tṛptirāste //
śaraṇamayamayañca daivatamme gatiraparā mama nāsti nāsti nāsti //
namo buddhāya dharmāya saṅghāya ca namo namaḥ //
bho vītarāga bhagavaṃstava pādameva vande munīndra muhurevamimaṃ pravande /
bhūyaḥ punaḥ punarimaṃ parataḥ parastāt pārśvadvayorupari dikṣu vidikṣu vande //
gatamiha bhavatā pathā ca yena sthitamapi yatra ca yatra vā niṣaṇṇam /
śayitamapi munīndra yatra yogāt tadapi śataṃ praṇamāmi puṇyatīrtham //
samajani bhagavān svayaṃ sma yasmin sakalamabodhi ca yatra dharmacakram /
yaṃ prāpya māravijayānupadaṃ prapede sarvajñatāṃ sa bhagavān tamahaṃ namāmi //
mūrddhan buddhaṃ nama tvaṃ śravaṇa śṛṇu sadā dharmamadvaidhavādi
proktaṃ sarvatra rūpaṃ nayana nirupamaṃ paśya jighrāṅaghripadmam /
ghrāṇa tvaṃ cārkabandhoḥ stuhi sakhi rasane śrīghanaṃ pūjayethāḥ
siddhaṃ pāṇe vrajāṅghre jinasadanamadasmadguṇaṃ citta cintya //
eṣo 'haṃ tatparaḥ syāmparamayanamito nāsti me satyametat
nāhaṃ lābhārcanārthī na ca bhayacakito nāpi satkīrtikāmo
na tvaṃ dharmāṃśuvaṃśaprabhava iti mune nāpi vidyāśayā te /
pāramparyānnaca tvāṃ śaraṇamupagataḥ kintu te sārvajanyaṃ
samyagjñānaṃ samīkṣya tvayi bhavajaladhiṃ santarītuṃ pravṛttaḥ //
bhūpā vā yadi daṇḍayanti vibudhā nindanti vā bāndhavā
muñcanti kṣaṇamapyahaṃ jina pitarjīvāmi na tvāṃ vinā //
svarge vā vasatirmamāstu niraye tiryakṣu kiṃ vāsure
guro buddhasvāmin mama janaka māṃ pāhi bhavataḥ //
pitā mātā bhrātā tvamasi bhaginī tvaṃ ca vipadi
tvamaiśvaryyaṃ bhogo tvamasi dhanadhānyaṃ ca mahimā
yaśo vidyā prāṇastvamasi mama sarvajña sakalam //
adhigatāmṛta buddha mano 'mbujaṃ mama tavānagha gandhakuṭīyatām //
tvamekosi māṃ trātumīśo dayābdhe prabho 'taḥ prasīda prasīda prasīda //
prasīdeśa deveśa lokeśa jiṣṇo jagadvandya madvandya sadvandya buddha /
aghore bhavāre smarāre tamore tavaivāsmi bhakto vapurvāṅmanobhiḥ //
sa tava kulasutaḥ sa eva bhaktaḥ sa bhavati śāsanadhūrvahaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ /
sa ca śaraṇagataḥ sa eva dāsaḥ kathamapi yo na vilaṅghayet tavājñām //
jagadupakṛtireva buddha! pūjā tadapakṛtistava lokanātha! pīḍā /
jina jagadapakṛt kathaṃ na lajje gaditumahaṃ tava pādapadmabhaktaḥ //
tamahitamapakartturasya lokaṃ kva mama kṛpā muditā kva vā ca maitrī //
api ca viṣayiṇo na mokṣasiddhiḥ kimu karavāṇi munīndra dehi dāsyam //
tava kathamanuyāmi dharmanāvaṃ jina mama dehi kṛpākarāvalambam //
dhara gurutaratṛṣṇayā patantaṃ jina mama dehi kṛpākarāvalambam //
jagati tava kṛpā hi nirviśeṣā prapavatayā jina māṃ ca doṣaduṣṭam /
alamahamiaha no sukhī bhavendurna samakaraścaratīva sādhvasādhve(dhvoḥ) //
akaravamuruduṣkṛtaṃ purā yad mama vapuṣā manasā ca cetasā ca /
anukalamakhilaṃ pralīyatāṃ tat tava caraṇasmaraṇena sarvavedin //
sugata tava puraḥ puraḥ pṛthivyāṃ madhuramate patito 'smi daṇḍanatyā /
akuśalamakhilaṃ tavānubhāvāt prapatatu notpatatāt punaḥ sahaiva //
tava caraṇasarojameva vande tava padapaṅkajameva pūjayāmi /
tava padayugameva bhāvaye 'haṃ tava padameva sadaiva daivataṃ me //
kamapi na kathayāmi nārcayāmi kamapi na naumi na cintayāmi nehe /
kamapi na śaraṇaṃ vrajāmi hitvā tava caraṇaṃ pitarasmi kiṅkaraste //
sadasi sadasi vāci siddhaṃ pathi pathi sadmani sadmanīha buddham /
bhuvi bhuvi mama vāri vāri cetaḥ kalayatu nityamimaṃ hi lokanātham //
svapimi niśi nidhāya yaddhṛdi tvāṃ na mama samaṃ virahastvayā ta eva //
mama tadiha dinaṃ hi durdinaṃ syād aśitaghanasthagitaṃ na durdinaṃ me /
amṛtada ṣaḍabhijña dharmarāja tribhuvanavandya munīndra gotameti /
daśabala jina siddha vajrabuddhe sugata tathāgata buddha śākyasiṃha /
iti nigadati yaḥ kvacit kadācit tamabhinamāmyapi dāsavaṃśajātam //
kavivara vadatāṃvareśa śuddhodanasuta śākyamune mune prasīda //
amṛtamapi nipīya nirjarendra punarapi te 'pi śunīstanaṃ dhayanti /
sakṛdapi tava vāksudhārasajño na viśati jātu sa mātureva garbham //
kuru mama karuṇaṃ diśo na jāne guru tadavekṣya ca tiryagādiduḥkham //
agatikamativepate mano me jina kimahaṃ karavai prabho prasīda //
aviratamata eva śāntibīje tvayi valate ramate mamātra cetaḥ //
savipadi ramate na me mano 'taḥ suranaraśarmaṇi pūrvapūrvabhukte /
anudinamanubhūya śarkarāyāmapi viratiṃ kurute hi dṛṣṭadoṣaḥ //
kathamahamapahāya buddharatnaṃ jagati dhanī guṇavāṃśca paṇḍitaśca //
sa bhavati matimān sa nākulīnaḥ sa ca guṇavān sa ca kīrtimān sa śūraḥ /
sa jagati mahitaḥ sukhī sa eva tvayi jina yasya suniścalāsti bhaktiḥ //
api sakalamadhītamatra tena śrutamapi sarvamanuṣṭhitaṃ ca tena /
api jitamajitena tena viśvaṃ tvayi jina yasya suniścalāsti bhaktiḥ //
tyajati nijaparamparādareṇetarasamayasya jano na dṛṣṭa dṛṣṭim /
asuharamapi gauraveṇa māturna khalu śiśurviṣamodakaṃ tu muñcet //
kavivaramahamasmi paṇḍitaste jina na jahāmi kathannu kurgṛhītam /
nudati hi tamasantatiṃ pravṛttāṃ mihiramarīcisahāyinī sudṛṣṭiḥ //
sugatapadaparāṅmukhasya puṃsaḥ kimu tapasā yaśasā ca kiṃ kimanyaiḥ /
sugatapadaparāṅnukhasya puṃsaḥ kimu tapasā yaśasā ca kiṃ kimanyaiḥ //
sugatapadi na bhaktirasti yeṣāmajananireva mahītale 'stu teṣām /
kathitamiha kṛtāgasāṃ narāṇāṃ nirayagatirniyataṃ na cānyato yat //
jina bhavadanupāsakaṃ nṛpāsaṃ tyajatu mano mala nīcavattu jātyā //
tava padadṛḍhabhaktirantyajo 'pi pratibhavamastu narottamaḥ sakhā me //
sa bhavati surasundarīsakho 'nyaiḥ kṛtamabhinandati vārcanaṃ ca bhaktyā /
maṇikanakaśilādinirmitāṃ yaḥ praṇamati te pratimāṃ tayośca tulyam /
phalamiha manasaśca samprasādādanuparataṃ jina yo 'grato namet tvām //
sakṛdapi tava pādapadmapūjā vanakusumairapi yaḥ karoti dhīmān /
tava guṇakathane tu yaḥ prasannastamanuviśanti mune guṇāstvadīyāḥ /
sakṛdapi samadāyi deva kiñcid bhavaratimutsṛjatā janena tubhyam /
sugata tadakhilān lunāti dhārā vadasiriva drumamāśravādidoṣān //
kṛtamiha sukṛtaṃ mṛṣādṛśā yajjanayati tat kila tasya durvipākam /
tava padanaline nipatya bhūyo nipatati naiva caturṣvapāyakeṣu /
nahi kuśalakaro naraḥ kadāpi kvacidapi durgatimeti nātha kaścit //
iti bhavadupadeśato viditvā tava padapaṅkajapūjane rato 'smi /
dṛḍhayatu bhagavān yuge yuge me kumatimudasya bhave bhave 'ryabhaktim //
sthiramapi bhagavan kṣaṇaṃ tavoktau karacaraṇāni dṛgādi vairivargaḥ /
vyathayati hṛdayaṃ balādvicālya tvamidamanāthamanīśa pāhi pāhi //
yadi nayanamayaṃ vaśe vidhātuṃ yatati tadā dravati śravo yadā tat /
kabhamapi bhajate krameṇa dhairyaṃ ciaramidamabhyasanena saṃviraktyā //
viśadamapi manaḥ svabhāvato me cirakṛtakilviṣakālimāhṛtaṃ syāt /
sati sakalaguro mune prasanne kimiha durāpamamutra kiṃ durāpam /
na bhavati jina yāvadeṣa jīrṇo viṣayapiśācaniṣevaṇena tāvat /
jhaṭiti sukṛtakarmaṇi prayojya svava śaraṇāgatavatsalāgataṃ mām //
sthagayati mamatā ca māmahantā tadapi hi mohavijṛmbhitaṃ garīyaḥ //
ajani ca nijakāraṇena sarvaṃ nirasati jīryati naśyati svahetoḥ /
ahamapi hi tathaiva dhātupuñjaḥ kathamahamasya kathaṃ mune mamedam //
ātmabuddhiriha yasya jāyate sā ca tasya janayedahaṅkṛtim /
sā tanoti sutarāṃ bhavaspṛhāṃ saiva mohajananī muhurmuhuḥ //
tena karma kurute śubhāśubhaṃ taddhi duḥkhajanakaṃ bhavatraye /
duḥkhamūlamata eva sātmadhīḥ tāṃ lunīhi jina me vaco 'sinā //
snāne karmaṇi bhojane vitaraṇe ghrāṇe tathākarṇane
prātaḥ sāyamatho divā ca niśi ca tvatpādapadme vibho
cittaṃ me ramatāṃ munīndra satataṃ yūnāṃ yuvatyāmiva //
manmukte madudārabhāgya madaso madbuddha māṃ pālaya //
ko 'haṃ mūḍho varākastridaśanarapate kīrttane te guṇānām //
kalāmapi na ṣoḍaśīṃ bhajati tasya puṇyātmanaś
caturmukhamukho gaṇo diviṣadāṃ nṛṇāṃ kā kathā //
dṛśo bhavati gocaraṃ tadiha yasya tasya tvarān
pāṇḍityaṃ prathitaṃ jagatsu bhagavan sarvajñanāmnaiva te
sāmrājyasya ca yauvane nirasanaṃ vairāgyasīmā sphuṭam //
evaṃ te guṇasampado na viṣayā buddherasūyātmanāṃ
te mūḍhāḥ pralapanti hanta sugato madvedanindītyayam //
ye tvāṃ gacchanti buddhaṃ śaraṇamiti na te durgatiṃ yānti santas
duḥkhaṃ durvyādhayo 'pi kvacidiha kuśalān nopasarpanti caivam //
chatraṃ brahmā vyadhātte maṇimayamamalaṃ cāmaraṃ cakrapāṇi
mātevāsīt parastrī bhavati paradhane na spṛhā yasya puṃso
mithyāvādī na yaḥ syānna pibati madirāṃ prāṇino yo na hanyāt /
dharmātmā te sa eva prabhavati bhagavan pādapūjāṃ vidhātum //
apyāsīddhīmān sa eva tridaśanaraguro tvatsuto nātra śaṅkā //
dharmāṇāṃ hetureṣāṃ tava jina vacanaṃ tasya hetustvameva //
tava ca guṇamanantaṃ vedasī buddha caivam //
śrīśākyamunerbhagavataḥ sarvajñasya paramopāsakena gauḍadeśīyaśrībauddhāgamacakravarttinā bhūsureṇācāryeṇa mahāpaṇḍitena
buddho me jayatāṃ jinaḥ sa bhagavān taddeśanā nirmalā
varṣantu stanayitnavaśca samaye maitrīṃ labhantāṃ prajāḥ //
namo buddhāya gurave namo dharmāya śāsine /
namaḥ saṅghāya mahate tribhyo 'pi satataṃ namaḥ //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 19: Buddhabhaṭṭārakastotram
prāpnuvanti padaṃ mokṣaṃ divyaṃ tvatha sanātanam //
vyādhayo 'pi na bādhyante pātakaṃ ca vinaśyati //
medhāvī ca tathā vāgmī jāyate janmajanmani //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 20: Buddhagaṇḍīstavaḥ ācārya-aśvaghoṣakṛtaḥ
kṣobhaṃ naivābhiyātaḥ suranaranamitaḥ pātu vaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ //
ryaḥ sphītāḍambarāṇāṃ taṭiti taṭataṭā tātaṭīti pralāpaiḥ /
kutkud budbud kukūcit kukuhakuhakuhaiḥ kiṅkarāṇāṃ ca vāgbhi
rno trasyaḥ so 'stu saumyaḥ śrutasakalamalaḥ śāntaye vo munīndraḥ //
rbhrāntiṃ ceto na citraṃ smarabalajayino yasya tasmai namo 'stu //
maitrīśastreṇa yena prasabhamabhijitāḥ pātu vaḥ so munīndraḥ //
puṣpeṣoḥ sainyamuccairjhaṭiti vighaṭitaṃ yena buddhaḥ sa vo 'vyāt //
saṃbuddhaḥ pātu yuṣmān vyapagatakaluṣo lokanātho munīndraḥ //
sa śrīmān buddhavīraḥ kaluṣabhayaharaḥ pātu vo vītarāgaḥ //
na kṣubdhaṃ yasya cittaṃ girisamamacalaṃ gāḍhaparyaṅkabandhaṃ
taṃ vande vandanīyaṃ tribhavabhayaharaṃ buddhavīraṃ pravīram //
bhagnaṃ kartu na śaktāḥ paṭupaṭahapaṭasphālanairyasya bodhau
dṛptānāṃ gṛdhrakūṭe paṭupaṭahapaṭuḥ so 'stu vo buddhavīraḥ //
ḍimbaṃ ḍimbaṃ ḍaḍimbaṃ ḍuha ḍuhaka ḍuhaṃ tṛṃkhalastṛṃkhalastṛm /
jhimbaṃ jhimbaṃ jhajhimbaṃ khamu khamu khamukhaṃ maṃkhu maṃkhuḥ khumaṃkhur
ebhirdhvānairna bhītaḥ suravaranamitaḥ pātu vaḥ śākyasiṃhaḥ //
tasyeyaṃ dharmadūtī dhvanati bhagavato dharmarājasya gaṇḍī //
nighnannaprāptadṛṣṭiḥ kṣaṇamapi ca cirādantako yad durantaṃ
itthaṃ ratnatrayājñāmiva vadati muhuḥ prāṇināṃ yasya saiṣām
mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalamivoḍugaṇaṃ vijitya bhātīha tīrthikajanaṃ jinaśāsanaṃ ca /
yasyātyantaṃ dṛḍhatvaṃ jami jami ḍuḍubhaṃ rañjitenālināliṃ
ruṇḍaṃ ruṇḍaṃ ruruṇḍaṃ yaralava khakhumaṃ maṃkhumaṃkhuḥ khumaṃkhuḥ
paśya tvaṃ jīvaloke daśabalabalinaḥ pīḍyate mārasainyam //
śrutvā gaṇḍīṃ pracaṇḍāṃ vividhabhayakarīṃ trāsanīṃ tairthikānāṃ
bauddhānāṃ śāntihetoḥ pratiraṇati mahīṃ rāvayantīva sadyaḥ //
eṣā vihāraśikhare pravirauti gaṇḍī meghasvanena kurute ca manojñaghoṣān /
māteva vatsalatayā subahirgatāṃśca putrān samāhvayati bhojanakālagaṇḍī //
nādaṃ karoti suradundubhitulyaghoṣā gaṇḍī samastaduritāni nivārayantī //
eṣā hi gaṇḍī raṇate narāṇāṃ saṃbodhinī devanarāsurāṇām /

yā devī māyāyā mātā mātṝṇāṃ vajrayogiṇī /
yā devī pañcabhūtānāṃ candre sūrye pratiṣṭhitā /
ya idaṃ paṭhate dhīmān devyā bhaktisamanvitaḥ /

ye jinapūrvakāye bhavanti ye ca dhriyanti daśadiśi loke /
tān hi jināṃśca karomi praṇāmaṃ taṃ jinasaṃghamahaṃ prabhijaṣye //
sūkṣmarajopama ye ca bhavanti sūkṣmarajopama ye tiṣṭhanti //

ye ca sunirvṛtasādhujinānāṃ sā ca lalāṭa vicitra anekaiḥ //
ekajinasya guṇān nahi śakyo jihvasahasreṇa bhāṣitu kiṃcit /
kāmamaśakti hi sarvajinānāṃ ekaguṇasya hi vistaravaktum //
ye jalagrahaṇatu śakyapramāṇaṃ naiva tu ekaguṇā sugatāntam //
prameya saṃcita puṇyaphalāgraṃ tena ca sattva prabhotu jinatvam //
eva tu viśvaṃ narapatibuddhaṃ eva karomi nṛpaḥpraṇidhānam /

īdṛśabherī paśyami svapne īdṛśanādaṃ tatra śṛṇomi /
īdṛśa jinastuti kamalākareṇa jāti jarāsmara tatra labheyam //
buddhaguṇāni anantamatulyaṃ ye 'pi ca durlabha kalpasahasram /
anuśruta ye ca svapnagate 'pi teṣu ca deśayi divasagato 'pi //
duḥkhasamudra vimocayi sattvā pūrayi ṣaḍabhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ /

yau ima dārakadvau mama putrau kanakendra kanakaprabhāśvarau /
tau ubhi dāraka tatra labheyaṃ bodhimanuttaravyākaraṇaṃ ca //
ye pi ca sattva anekamanantā śaraṇavihīnā vyasanagatāśca /
kalpa anāgata bodhi careyaṃ yattahu pūrvaṃ koṭi gatāśca //
karmasamudra vikīryatu mahyaṃ kleśasamudra vichidyatu mahyam //
puṇyasamudraṃ pūryatu mahyaṃ jñānasamudra viśodhyatu mahyam /
vimalajñāna prabhāsavareṇa kāma prabhā ca bhaviṣyatu mahyam //
puṇyaprabhāsa vilocanatā ca sarvatriloki viśiṣṭa bhaveyam /

toṣaṃ māṇikyadīpā iva dadatu nakhāḥ padmapāṇeḥ padorvaḥ //
udbhedo bhedako 'sau bhavatu bhavabhiyāṃ nirbharāṇāṃ bharaṃ vaḥ /

yatpūjāyāṃ sureśaḥ sa jayati caraṇo vārijavyagrapāṇeḥ //
yo nāthasyaiva nāsīdapi khalu sugateḥ kāraṇaṃ janmabhājāṃ
yasmin padmābhilāṣī na madhupanivahaḥ pakṣapātī jano 'pi /
vācālā nirvicārā racayatu caraṇotsarpiṇī saṃpadaṃ vaḥ /
niḥśeṣaṃ divyalokaḥ sa jayati caraṇo buddhabimbāṅkamauleḥ //
bhūyād bhadrāya pādaḥ kamaladharagireḥ sevitaḥ siddhasārthaiḥ
iti pādukādeśanā vṛtto nṛttaprakāraḥ sapadi vighaṭitā vādyavidyānavadyā
ityantaḥ smeraśākre sadasi na śakitā yatra pūjāpsarobhiḥ
kartuṃ bhāvāturābhiḥ sa jayati janitātṛptirūpaḥ sarojī //
yātaḥ satkārakārī gurutarakaruṇaḥ pātu lokeśvaro vaḥ //
ālīyante ladhīyaḥ sa jagati kamalī pālanāyāla mastu //
pradhvaṃsaṃ sādhu dheyānniravadhi sa vidhiṃ buddhadhāro dhṛtervaḥ //
lokeśaḥ sa prakāmopakaraṇakaruṇaḥ kāmakṛtyaṃ kriyād vaḥ //
duryogaṃ vaḥ sa yogī sthagayatu sugatāsaṅgituṅgottamāṅgaḥ //

yasmin vinyasya bhāraṃ laghuralaghukṛpo viśvadīpaṃ prapede
nyastā haste praśastā nija iva kamalālaṃkṛtirbhaktibhājām /

vyāyāme sa prakāmaṃ śamayatu sugatāvāsamaulirmalaṃ vaḥ //

tava saumyatayā 'pyabhibhūtatamo na virājati śītakaro gagane /
tava kāñcanakuṅkumasaprabhayā prabhayā 'bhihato na vibhāti raviḥ //
tava nātha śubhe vadanāmburūhe nayanabhramarā nipatanti nṛṇām /
pratibuddhadale kamale vimale bhramarā iva puṣpaśatākulitāḥ //
iti toṭakamantravarairatulaiḥ parikīrtya mayā tava varṇalavān /
yadupārjitamadya śubhaṃ vipulaṃ śivamastu tato bhuvi devanṛṇām //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 54: Nairātmāṣṭakastotram
nairātmā varadā devī nityameva namo 'stu te //
gaurīṃ caurīṃ ca vetālīṃ ghasmarīṃ pukkasīṃ tathā /
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 55: Narakoddhārastotram
pratijñātaṃ samutpāde trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
bandhuvargaiḥ parityaktaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
ekākī taṃ hi bhokṣyāmi trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
andhībhūto 'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
durlaṅghyaṃ ca mayā dṛṣṭaṃ trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
dharmādharma na vijñātaṃ gamyāgamyaṃ na veditam /
acetano 'smyahaṃ nātha trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
pacyāmi narake ghore trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
kṛtā mayā sattvahiṃsā trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
veṣṭitaṃ karmasūtreṇa trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
īdṛśaṃ jīvitaṃ loke trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
panthānaṃ nātra paśyāmi trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
rājahatyāṃ tadā manye trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kasya trāhi māṃ hi tathāgata //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 56: Niraupamyastavaḥ
na ca nāma tvayā kiñcid dṛṣṭaṃ bauddhena cakṣuṣā /
na boddhā na ca boddhavyamastīha paramārthataḥ /
na tvayotpāditaḥ kaścid dharmo nāpi nirodhitaḥ /
na te 'sti saktiḥ skandheṣu na dhātvāyataneṣu ca /
sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
na ca rūpeṇa dṛṣṭena dṛṣṭa ityabhidhīyase /
dharmadṛṣṭyā sudṛṣṭo 'si dharmatā na ca dṛśyate //
śauṣīryo nāsti te kāyo māṃsāsthirudhiro na ca /
nāmayo nāśuciḥ kāye kṣuttṛṣṇāsambhavo na ca /
nityo dhruvaḥ śivaḥ kāyastava dharmamayo jina /
na te 'sti manyanā nātha na vikalpo na ceñjanā /
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 57: Pañcākṣarastotram
namo buddhāya na jāto na mṛtaścaiva na rūpo nāpi rūpavān /
na saṃsāre na nirvāṇe na kārastena sūcyate //

Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 59: Pañcatathāgatastotram
śrībuddha buddhādhipa buddharūpa buddhānvitān bodhayase vibuddhaḥ /

śrīvajra vajrāmala jātavajra vajreṇa dīptena pradīpya lokam /
dadan yogena tu vajrasaṃvarṣaṃ vajrātmabhāvaṃ kuruṣe suvajra //

Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 61: Paramārthastavaḥ
na bhāvo nāpyabhāvo 'si nocchedo nāpi śāśvataḥ /
na pītaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇo vā avarṇāya namo 'stu te //
na mahān nāpi hrasvo 'si na dīrghaḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ /
na dūre nāpi vāsanne nākāśe nāpi vā kṣitau /
na saṃsāre na nirvāṇe asthitāya namo 'stu te //
parāṃ gambhīratāṃ prāpto gambhīrāya namo 'stu te //
evaṃ stute stuto bhūyādathavā kiṃ vata stutaḥ /
śūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu kaḥ stutaḥ kena vā stutaḥ //
yasya nānto na madhyaṃ vā grāhyagrāho na vidyate //
na gataṃ nāgataṃ stutvā sugataṃ gativarjitam /
tena puṇyena loko 'yaṃ vrajatāṃ saugatīṃ gatim //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 62: Pīṭhastavaḥ
brahmāṇī tattvarūpā vividhaghanaravā ghoracaṇḍī ca raudrī
kaumārī kīrtikāmā pibati madhumadaṃ vaiṣṇavī gāyamānā /
cāmuṇḍā cāpi lakṣmīrharagaṇasahitā mātaro vaḥ punantu //
uttare saṃsthitā pīṭhe māheśvarī namo 'stu te /
agnipīṭhasthitā nityaṃ kaumārī te namo namaḥ //
svarge martye ca pātāle sthitirūpeṇa saṃsthitā /
yāmyapīṭhe sthitā nityaṃ kolarūpī namo 'stu te //
triśūlaṃ muṇḍaṃ khaṭvāṅgaṃ ḍamaruṃ tarjanīṃ dhvajam //
potasadma tathā vīrastataḥ sarva namo 'stu te //
ekavāraṃ dvivāraṃ ca trivāraṃ yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ /
ṛddhiṃ siddhiṃ śriyaṃ lakṣmīṃ vidyāṃ jñānaṃ sutādi ca /
buddhiṃ prajāṃ sumitrāṇi vardhayecca dine dine //
nākāle maraṇaṃ caiva utpātaṃ nāśayet sadā /

yastvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam //

manorathaprade śuddhe prajñe devi namo 'stu te //
lakṣmīstvamasi kalyāṇi śrīrdhīḥ śraddhā dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ /

amaraughaiḥ pūjitāṃ tvāṃ nato 'smi pratipadajanarakṣākāriṇīṃ sarvakālam /
viṣamapadaśaraṇye sarvadā tvāṃ namasye vasita iva araṇye dāvadagdhe virasye //
śravaṇalalitalole kuṇḍale saṃvahantīṃ mukuṭamaṇiśikhābhiḥ kāśitāṃ tāṃ namāmi //
sapadi vigatarakṣāṃ rakṣa me mātaraṃ ca /
bhavatu mama tu saṃpat sarvabhāvā kṛśāno
vipacatu mayi sarvaṃ mādṛśaṃ karma bhogyaṃ
kuruta kuruta dhairyaṃ yena mokṣaṃ sulabhyaṃ
muhuriha hi śaraṇyāṃ tāṃ smaran sarvarakṣām //
prabhāvatāho punareva tasyāḥ vahniṃ jalaṃ cāpi giriṃ sthalaṃ vai /

Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 67: Rakṣākāla(kara)stavaḥ
tatsarvaṃ hara me nātha rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka //
saṃsāre vyāpito 'haṃ tu kathaṃ pāraṃ prayāsyate /
tvameva śaraṇaṃ tatra rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka //
sadā kṛpāmayastvaṃ hi sadā rakṣāmayo 'si ca /
sadā prajñāmayastvaṃ hi rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka //
yena yena kṛtaṃ karma tena tenaiva dhāritam /
vandanīyaḥ sadā tvaṃ hi rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka //
bharti vā bhartiko vāpi mitraṃ vā śatruko 'pi vā /
sarvatra ca dayāyukto rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka //
tvāṃ namāmi punarbhūyo rakṣa māṃ lokanāyaka //
dayasva cāvalokeśa mocayasva ca māṃ kṣaṇāt //
astu te karuṇā mahyaṃ bhaktiṃ caivācalāṃ kuru //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 68: Ratnamālāstotram
vaineyakomalabhavapratibodhanāya kiṃ dhāma saṃbhṛta mahāśubhalakṣaṇaṃ te /
niryāta eva hi pitāmahadevapūjāṃ lokeśvareśvaraparaṃ śirasā namāmi //
nārāyaṇo 'pi bhuvaneśvara eva tasmāt puṃsāṃ tvameva paramottama eva nānyaḥ //
yanniḥsṛtau śaśiravī bhuvi locanābhyāṃ dhvastāntarālatamasaṃ tamahaṃ namāmi //
devaḥ samīraṇavaro bhuvi janmabhājāmīryāpathārthaphaladaṃ tamahaṃ namāmi //
yanniḥsṛtā bhagavatī dharaṇī prasiddhā trailokyanāthamasamaṃ satataṃ namāmi //
saṃsāramuktamapi susthitameva tatra kāruṇyataśca bhavacāriṇi sattvavarge /
bhūyāt sthitirmama sadāsthirasā bhavantamevaṃ mahāśayavaraṃ paramaṃ namāmi //
svāṃ tarjanīṃ mukhadhṛto 'hitatarjanena saṃcālitāśca bahumerugaṇā nakhasya /
koṣoddhṛtaṃ jaladhitoyamaśeṣataḥ syāt sāmarthyamīdṛśamaho bhavataḥ kuto 'nyat //
kvedaṃ ca śaiśavaparaṃ nanu cārurupaṃ saṃdarśanīyavarakomalabālacandram /
durvāramāramathanaṃ ca mayaikasahyaṃ vikrāntaduḥsahaparaṃ kva ca ceṣṭitaṃ te //
kleśendhane jvalitavisphuritatvavahnerdhūmāvalīva vimalā nanu lakṣyate te //
paryanta iṣṭaśaśino bhavaneṣu yatte manye virāji nikhilaṃ tava kāntileśāt //
bandhurhi ko mārgikasaṃmataṃ mataṃ naro narī sā sa ca satpathaṃ patham /
śamīkṛtāśeṣajanaṃ śivaṃ śivaṃ namāmi bhūmīśvararājinaṃ jinam //
gabhastimālāmitasaṃkulaṃ kulaṃ tatra svapāṇau dhṛtapaṅkajaṃ kajam /
vikalpahīnaṃ dhvanideśakaṃ śakaṃ namāmi bhūmīśvarājinaṃ jinam //
avāpi yattena śubhapraviṣṭaṃ tenaiva loko 'stu samantabhadraḥ //

sarvabhūtamaṇikampita tubhyaṃ kṣāntimeva caritaṃ tava rūpam /

Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 72: Saptabuddhastotram
taṃ vande jñānavāri praṇamitasakalaṃ kleśavahniṃ jinendram //

saṃprāptā yena bodhiḥ parahitapaṭunā puṇḍarīkasya mūle
kṣemāvatyāṃ prajāto manujapatisame yo vaśī vipravaṃśe
taṃ vande vandanīyaṃ munivaramanaghaṃ kāśyapaṃ lokanātham //
maitreyaṃ ca stuvan vai tuṣitapuragataṃ bhāvinaṃ lokanātham /
chitvā saṃkleśapāśān munaya iva caran nirvṛtiṃ sa prayātu //

vipaśyinaṃ tribhavamahaughasāragaṃ namāmi taṃ sugatagatiṃ tathāgatam //

hataṃ tamo vigatamalena yena taṃ surārcitaṃ kanakamuniṃ namāmyaham //
yo nirvṛtaḥ śākyamunipradīpastasmaiḥ namaḥ paramakāruṇikāya śāstre //
utpatsyate yaḥ sugataḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvātmanā 'haṃ praṇato 'smi tasmai //

Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 78: Sattvārādhanagāthā ārya nāgārjunakṛtā
sattvārthameva mayi tiṣṭhati sattvaśraddhā nānyatra sā, hyahamaho 'dhigṛhītasattvaḥ /
caryā 'dhamā karuṇayā rahitā bhaved yā saṃbhāvyate karuṇayaiva prahāṇamasyāḥ //
sattveṣu yasya nitarāṃ karuṇāpravṛttirārādhakaḥ sa mama śāsanamarmavettā /
śīlaṃ śrutiśca karuṇā ca sudhośca yasya nityaṃ sa eva sugatārcanakṛnnigadyate //
kalyāṇakāramadhikṛtya gato 'smi siddhiṃ sattvārthameva tanumeṣa samudvahāmi /
naivaṃ kriyeta yadi sattvahitaṃ mayā ced vyarthaṃ karomi tanupoṣaṇamannapānaiḥ //
sattvān hinasti manasāpi hi yaḥ sa kasmānmāmeva saṃśrayati yo mayi nirvyapekṣaḥ /
pūjā tu sā bhavati sattvahitekṣaṇāpi pūjyasya yā manasi tuṣṭimupādadāti //
hiṃsātmikā paraviheṭhanasambhavā vā pūjā na pūjyamanugacchati saṃskṛtāpi /
dārāḥ sutāśca vibhavaśca mahattva(cca) rājyaṃ māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitavase nayate śarīram //
yeṣāṃ priyatvamadhikṛtya mayojjhitaṃ yat yastān viheṭhayati tena viheṭhito 'ham /
sattvopakāraparamā hi mamāgrapūjā sattvāpakāraparayā ca parābhavaḥ syāt //
sattvārthena samudyatena manasā mārasya bhagnaṃ balaṃ
sattvaireva tathā tathā viracitaṃ yenāsmi buddhaḥ kṛtaḥ //
kasmin vastuni siddhyatāmiha kṛpā maitrī ca kvālambatāṃ
na syurjanmani janma(ni) priyavidhau mitraṃ yadi prāṇinaḥ //
sattvā eva ca pātratāmupagataṃ deyaṃ mayā grāhitāḥ /
sattvāneva na pālayāmi yadi cet kasyārthamarthaḥ kṛtaḥ //
kasyārthena samīhitaṃ yadi na me sattvā bhaveyuḥ priyāḥ //
yāvaccedaṃ jvalati jagataḥ śāsanaṃ śāsanaṃ me
khedaḥ kāryo na ca tanumimaṃ muktasāraṃ bhavadbhiḥ //
Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 79: Śākyasiṃhastotram brahmaṇā kṛtam
prāptaṃ tvayā jñānamanantadharmaṃ yenākariṣyaḥ sakalasya haityam //
pravartitaṃ yena sudharmacakraṃ yasmin mahī sodadhiśailarājā /
ānanditeva calitā hyajasraṃ namo 'stu tubhyaṃ tribhavādhipāya //
yasmiṃśca vātāstriguṇena yuktā vavurnabhasto nipatanti vastrāḥ(rṣāḥ) /
vicitrapuṣpāṇi sugandhi vāri namo 'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekanātha //
jitaṃ tvayaikena nirāyudhena namo 'stu tubhyaṃ balavartanāya //
tuṣitāyuto janma cakāra martye namo 'stu tubhyaṃ varabodhirāja //
samyak pratijñāṃ pratikṛtya yena saṃpreṣyate mokṣapure janaughaḥ /
tadarthamāyāsi ca martyaloke namo 'stu tubhyaṃ sumahatpratijña //
yaścāṣṭakaṃ brahmakṛtaṃ supuṇyaṃ paṭhiṣyati śākyavarāgrataḥ sthaḥ /
duḥkhaṃ mahāpāpabhayaṃ ca hitvā śrīśrīghane yāsyati pattane mudā //

babhāṇa vaṃśasthaviro nṛpādhipo janān pratītyāhvayatātmajaṃ mama /
kṛtāribhaṅgaṃ jinarājamīśvaraṃ gataṃ ṣaḍabdaṃ ca viyogabhāvayoḥ //
bhajasva vaṃśasthaviraṃ munīśvaraṃ mahāvane vṛkṣatale śucisthale /

Digital Sanskrit Buddhist Canon, Stotra section, text no. 84: Śākyasiṃhastotram surapatikṛtam
rityākhyāṃ bodhihetustadanu ca tuṣitā cāgatā bodhirāja /
garbhe sthitvā 'pi yastvaṃ sakalahitakarīṃ dharmavyākhyāṃ karoṣi
lokācāraṃ ca kṛtvā vihitadaśavidhiṃ vai vivāhādi tattat
tyaktvā sarvāṃśca rājyaṃ sakalajanahite nirgataṃ tvāṃ name 'ham //
proddhṛtvā svargaloke suratarukalite sthāpitā yena vande //
sākṣībhūtā nilīnā praṇamitaśirasā tvāṃ name 'haṃ jinendram //
ūrdhvaṃ lokottarākhye nijabhuvanavare bhāsitaṃ tvāṃ name 'ham //

taiḥ sarvairmīlayitvā yadi tava mahimā varṇyate kalpakālam /

om namo vajrayoginyai / om namo buddhadharmasaṃghebhyaḥ / om namo gurubuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ / om namo locanādidaśavajravilāsinībhyaḥ / namo yamāntakādidaśakroḍha(dha) vīrebhyaḥ / vārāhī śauṇḍinī caiva caṇḍālī ḍombinī tathā /

om namaḥ śrī vajrayoginyai, namobuddhadharmasaṃghebhyaḥ, namo gurubuddhabodhisattvebhyaḥ, namo locanādidaśavajravilāsinībhyaḥ, namo yamāntakādidaśakrodhavīrebhyaḥ saprajñebhyaḥ /
om o ā hūṃ iti kāyavākacita indriyavijñānāni, vākacittāni manovijñānāni, paracittajñānābhijñā, parakāyapraveśābhijñā puṇḍarīkeṣu nābhisthe raktasūrya maṇḍalaḥ //
tadbhavā pītavarṇā ca avadhūtyā(tī) svayaṃ sthitā //
lalanāyāṃ tu suśyāmā rasanāyāṃ ca gaurikā /
asyā vāme sthitā śyāmā nāmnā sā varavarṇinī //
karparaḥ savyahaste ca kartirvāme ca saṃsthitā /
dakṣiṇe caiva pītā vai vajravairocanī sthitā //
karau ca dvau tayoḥ pādau viparītau tathā sthitau /
akṣayā subhagā nityaṃ hantrī ca mṛtyujanmanoḥ /
daurmanasyādi kartyā ca kartantī sarvameva tat //
svārthaṃ kartuṃ parārthaṃ ca bhavāmyahaṃ yathā kṣamaḥ //
gurubhaktiṃ na jāne 'haṃ tvadbhaktiṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
kāyavākacetasāṃ sāmyaṃ kuru me tvaṃ prasādataḥ /
yena muñcāmi saṃsāraṃ ṣaḍgatiṃ na viśāmyaham //
māraiḥ sarvaiḥ parityakto yathā kāyo bhavenmama //
dehi me tvaṃ varāṃ siddhiṃ hitvā caiva gamāgamam //

śrīguhyasamayatantre trikāyavajrayoginyāḥ stutipraṇidhānaṃ samāptam /
      kṛtiriyaṃ siddhācārya śrīvirūpādānām //
